ctx: intros a b P H1 H2 H3 H4.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a, b : poly A0 eqA ltM P : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) H1 : ~ zerop A A0 eqA n ltM (nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a P) H2 : In b P H3 : ~ zerop A A0 eqA n ltM b H4 : mdiv n (get_mon b) (get_mon (nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a P)) Unable to unify "~ zerop A A0 eqA n ltM (nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a P)" with "zerop A A0 eqA n ltM b".

original: intros a b P H1 H2 H3 H4. intros H5 H6. intro H7. apply H7. apply H1. auto.
